![City Of Nash Texas leadership7](https://nashtx.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/City-Of-Nash-Texas-leadership7.jpg "Jimmy Norwood 1")

Jimmy Norwood
-------------

Council Member of Nash, Texas
-----------------------------

Mr. Norwood retired from International Paper as a member of the Safety Support Team after 40 years of dedication to the success of the company. He has been a long-time Nash resident of 24 years and thoroughly enjoys being involved in his community.
Jimmy serves as a member of the Texarkana Sunrise Rotary Club as well as a Trustee at Hardy Memorial Methodist. Mr. Norwood enjoys spending time working in his yard, collecting Hopalong Cassidy items, woodworking and being an active member of the Arklahomatex Corvette Club.
Jimmy is married to Lana Norwood and together they have 6 children and 11 grandchildren.

Jimmy Norwood
-------------

Council Member of Nash, Texas
-----------------------------

Mr. Norwood retired from International Paper as a member of the Safety Support Team after 40 years of dedication to the success of the company. He has been a long-time Nash resident of 24 years and thoroughly enjoys being involved in his community.
Jimmy serves as a member of the Texarkana Sunrise Rotary Club as well as a Trustee at Hardy Memorial Methodist. Mr. Norwood enjoys spending time working in his yard, collecting Hopalong Cassidy items, woodworking and being an active member of the Arklahomatex Corvette Club.
Jimmy is married to Lana Norwood and together they have 6 children and 11 grandchildren.
